attributes.title: The worst app EVER! 🍊✨🙈
attributes.review: When I tried to download the app it started glitching real bad and then my phone started shaking and then my phone started letting out smoke. Definitely don’t recommend this at ALL! I mean this has never happened to me with tiktok.. all I’m saying is that this app is terrible I tried to learn more about our amazing 🍊 president and this has what happened! I wanted to learn more about how badly he’s handled this country 😍 I mean who else wouldn’t want to learn about the terrible things he’s done like putting kids in cages, rape, been extremely racist and homophobic !! 😲 gosh I just wanted to learn about that but the app crashed. It would be a shame if the App Store took it down 😔

attributes.title: What a Mess!!
attributes.review: This app is a flaming mess! Not only is the layout ugly and confusing, this app sold my information to CHINA! that’s right CHINA! also, it sent mercenaries to my home and it killed my wife and kids. and stole my amazon packages off of my front porch.

attributes.title: This app is a disgrace to man kind.
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support our child rapist scumbag😪🙈 It was fine at first then I started receiving massages from daddy trump himself saying if I wanted to “hangout” I was absolutely disgusted that his majesty would ever say that to an underaged women! Or was I? Actually no I wasn’t but anyway don’t get the app it hacks into your phone and makes you do a lot of crazy things like kill your grandma!! Don’t ask.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP
attributes.review: It’s took 2 HOURS to download and I have perfectly good WiFi I even sat next to the WiFi box thing to see if it would go faster BUT IT DIDNT 🙄🙄🙄 so there I was waiting👁👄👁 there for 2 hours for the stupidest app ever created.Secondly it kept freezing every time I opened it but every other app was working just fine.
